text: Super Mario Land is a platform video game made by Nintendo for the Game Boy game console. It is one of the only two Mario games designed by Gunpei Yokoi, and the first Mario game for a handheld console. ==Plot== An evil alien monster called Tatanga comes to a kingdom called Sarasaland and kidnaps Princess Daisy. Mario comes to save her and has to go through four worlds and defeat Tatanga's four minions to rescue Daisy from Tatanga. ==References== Category:1989 video games Category:Mario platform games Category:Game Boy games Category:Nintendo Research & Development 1 games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games about alien invasions Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual Console games
title: Super Mario Land
